titleStmt.title: A rejoynder to Master Samuel Eaton and Master Timothy Taylor's reply. Or, an answer to their late book called A defence of sundry positions and scriptures, &c. With some occasionall animadversions on the book called the Congregational way justified. For the satisfaction of all that seek the truth in love, especially for his dearly beloved and longed for, the inhabitants in and neer to Manchester in Lancashire. / Made and published by Richard Hollinworth. Mancuniens.
titleStmt.author: Hollingworth, Richard, 1607-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. and E.M. for Luke Fawne, and are to be sold at the signe of the Parrot in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
